mainSubtitle: Professional Contract and Legal Document Generator

administration.title: Administration Agreement
administration.description: Contract where the composer authorizes your company to administer their musical copyrights, collect royalties and register works with PROs (ASCAP, BMI, The MLC). Does not transfer ownership, only management rights.

publishing.title: Publishing Agreement
publishing.description: Agreement where the composer assigns part of the publishing rights to your company. Can be co-publishing (50/50) or full publishing. Includes participation in publishing and mechanical income.

songwriter.title: Songwriter Agreement
songwriter.description: Contract between composer and publisher establishing terms for future works. Defines how composition royalties will be split, advances, and composer's obligations to deliver works.
songwriter.minimum: Minimum Number of Works per Year

splitsheet.title: Split Sheet
splitsheet.description: Document specifying who wrote what percentage of a song. Essential to avoid disputes and register correctly with PROs. Defines composition and publishing splits.

letter.title: Letter of Direction
letter.description: Formal letter where the composer instructs PROs (ASCAP, BMI, The MLC) to pay royalties directly to your company as authorized administrator. It is the official payment authorization.
